name: Everclimb
description:
Feel the thrill of climbing in this arcade-like game!

Welcome to Everclimb! This game was made in just 80 hours for the #JuiceJam. It was made with fast movement in mind, so use all the movement tools you have and give it your best to get to the top!

Even though we were a little bit late to join in on the fun, we are hoping that you find the game fun and pretty juicy!

Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Jump / Double Jump - Space Bar
  • Hookshot - Left Mouse Button
Tips
  • You'll always go to the closest handle when using your hookshot, pay attention!
  • Be careful of the avalanche, use your movement tools to escape and get to the nearest checkpoint.
  • Don't forget that you can double jump! Never!
